info.name: twilio-postman-collection
info.description: Postman Collection of Twilio API Requests

item.name: Create a Message and specify a StatusCallback URL
List messages (filter by a period of time)
Fetch Messaging Prices for a Country
Create a Call and specify a StatusCallback URL
Create a Call and specify a StatusCallbackEvent
Read calls (filter by a period of time)
Read calls (filter by call status and phone number)
Read calls (filter by calls from a specific device)

urlencoded.description: Call Quality expressed as an integer 1 to 5

item.name: List Conferences that started on a given date
List in-progress conferences on or after a given date

request.description: The following will return a list of all of the recordings generated for a given conference, identified by its ConferenceSid. (Note that recordings associated with an individual call leg of the conference will not be returned.)

item.name: Place a Participant on Hold with Music
Make an Announcement to the Participant
List an Account's Outgoing Caller IDs

request.description: Adds a new CallerID to your account. After making this request, Twilio will return to you a validation code and Twilio will dial the phone number given to perform validation. The code returned must be entered via the phone before the CallerID is added to your account.

item.name: TODO: Enable Voice dialing for low risk numbers on a given set of countries
Fetch Country permission by ISO code
TODO: Update voice dialing country permission
TODO: Disable Voice dialing for high risk numbers in a given set of highest risk countries
Fetch all high risk prefixes from a country permission resource
Fetch Inheritance Settings of Voice Dialing Permissions for a sub-account
Update Inheritance Settings of Voice Dialing Permissions for a sub-account
Create Recording on a Live Call
Create a dual channel call recording with RecordingStatusCallback
Get all Recordings for a given call
Get all Recordings for an Account
Pause a call Recording with skip option
Pause a conference recording with skip option
Pause a call recording with Twilio.CURRENT
List all IncomingPhoneNumber resources for your account

urlencoded.description: A unique string identifier for the conversation participant as Chat User. This parameter is non-null if (and only if) the participant is using the Programmable Chat SDK to communicate. Limited to 256 characters.

The address of the participant's device, e.g. a phone number or Messenger ID. Together with the Proxy address, this determines a participant uniquely. This field (with proxy_address) is only null when the participant is interacting from a Chat endpoint (see the 'identity' field). Limited to 256 characters.

The address of the Twilio phone number (or WhatsApp number, or Messenger Page ID) that the participant is in contact with. This field, together with participant address, is only null when the participant is interacting from a Chat endpoint (see the 'identity' field). Limited to 256 characters.

An optional string metadata field you can use to store any data you wish. The string value must contain structurally valid JSON if specified. Note that if the attributes are not set "{}" will be returned.

A unique string identifier for the conversation participant as Chat User. This parameter is non-null if (and only if) the participant is using the Programmable Chat SDK to communicate. Limited to 256 characters.

An optional string metadata field you can use to store any data you wish. The string value must contain structurally valid JSON if specified. Note that if the attributes are not set "{}" will be returned.
